lines.text: Take another step and I'll ventilate you!... Nobody outsmarts Cactus Jack Slade!
[Handsome Stranger and Cactus Jack are about to shoot it out]
Hold it! Like the man says... just hold it.
[She walks up to Cactus Jack]

[to Handsome Stranger]
Ah, exactly *what* are your intentions?
To see that justice is done!

[to Cactus Jack]
And yours?
Blow his head off! Steal the money!
And...?

[laughs]
... And then I'm gonna ravish you!
Handsome, you lose! What's-his-name here just... outbid you.

[Jack sticks his gun in the Bank Clerks face]
One. Close the door. Two. Open the safe. Three. On the floor.

[the Bank Clerk closes the door, and then gets on the floor. Jack leans down and taps the Bank Clerk on the shoulder with the gun]
You forgot Number two.
Oh no I didn't! I did that when you stuck that gun in my face!

[about Cactus Jack]
Why does banker want him watched? He needs to be looked after!
This is a seven-shot six-shooter, and I had it especially made.
Why?
Why?
Yeah...
I dunno.
I come to speak with straight tongue.
Tongue may be straight, but mouth hide many sharp teeth.
[Charity is bending over while wearing a low cut dress]
Would you help me with these please?
Sure.
[picks up her luggage and walks off]

[stuttering]
B-b-boy, you t-t-alk f-f-u-nny.

[heavy Austrian accent]
That's easy for you to say.
Take another step and I'll ventilate you!
